@staticmethod
    def plot_window_gap(window: "GapWindow") -> None:
        left_speech = window.left_speech
        right_speech = window.right_speech

        plt.figure(figsize=(10, 4))

        if left_speech:
            left_times = np.linspace(left_speech.start, left_speech.end, len(left_speech.rms_values))
            plt.plot(left_times, left_speech.rms_values, label=f"{left_speech.id} ({left_speech.label.value})")

        if right_speech:
            right_times = np.linspace(right_speech.start, right_speech.end, len(right_speech.rms_values))
            plt.plot(right_times, right_speech.rms_values, label=f"{right_speech.id} ({right_speech.label.value})")

        gap_segs: list[DetectedSegment] = window.gap.segments
        if not gap_segs:
            plt.xlabel("Time (s)")
            plt.ylabel("RMS")
            plt.title("Gap RMS Plot")
            plt.legend()
            plt.grid(True)
            plt.tight_layout()
            plt.show()
            return

        for seg in gap_segs:
            seg_times = np.linspace(seg.start, seg.end, len(seg.rms_values))
            plt.plot(seg_times, seg.rms_values, label=f"{seg.id} ({seg.label.value})")

        plt.xlabel("Time (s)")
        plt.ylabel("RMS")
        plt.title("Gap RMS Plot")
        plt.legend()
        plt.grid(True)
        plt.tight_layout()
        plt.show()
